item.description:
Hello All!

We can't wait until our next meetup! We will be meeting a member Michael Nigro's studio on State Street.

This is the one where you should bring your camera bags and share with everyone what you have hiddened away inside. Let's try and limit it to one bag per person- I know you all have many bags if you are anything like our fearless leader Scotty.

And of course, feel free to bring any new images you'd like to share.

Till next time- Keep shooting!

Donna and Scott

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography September Meetup
